channel.title: Client Run Error?
channel.description:
I get this error whenever I try to run my client
[code]New Era 317 client java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:42) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:42) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
Any Help?

item.title: Client Run Error?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:4, topic:370997”]java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Cache\main_file_cache.dat

I think this line means there is no main_file_cache.dat file in the Cache folder. :eek: Now get a clue.[/quote]
Its an antileech lols

Read full topic
